A Shy Kitty's Story

This project was adapted from Michael Hartl's Learn Enough to Be Dangerous Series, a pretty amazing tutorial series started by the Ruby on Rails Tutorial. But this is not that website. This is a move beyond in developing my own personalized website. It's also a bit of fun admist all the tutorials. Every day that I'm involved with web development practice. the more intested I become in making some type of career move into more of it. Visit Shy-Kitty now!.
